GSD.description:
ext2: Add more validity checks for inode counts

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit 0bcdc31094a12b4baf59e241feabc9787cf635fa. For more details please see the references link.
